title: Malzahar Skin
body:
I haven't really made up a skin or anything but I came up with this really cool name for a skin. It would be called WoWzahar, you could interpret it in many different ways, like you could put a WoW skin into League or just make a skin that would really WOW you!! Feel free to create sketches for the skin and post them below! 

Thanks for reading :) 

*I am Barry Allen, and I am not the fastest man alive*


 {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: WoW (see what I did there) KevinHe, that's actually a pretty good idea haha. I could see it happening in the near future LoL (I'm on fire). I can just imagine Malzahar with like fireworks or something and whenever he summons a voidling those fireworks exploding and stuff, looking forward to some great sketches people come up with!!
